content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly Culture As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v3
children.summary: The culture to be used for discovery. null means the default system culture, means the invariant culture, and any other value is assumed to be a culture name that the system understands.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly DiagnosticMessages As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v2, v3
children.summary: Set to true to enable display of diagnostic messages.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly IncludeSourceInformation As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v3
children.summary: Set to true to include source information during discovery, when possible. (Note that most source information is applied by the runner, not the discoverer, because it utilizes the DiaSession support provided by Visual Studio, which means it's applied after the fact by xunit.runner.visualstudio. This flag, then, is a signal for custom test frameworks that may be able to provide source information via some other mechanism.)

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly InternalDiagnosticMessages As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v2, v3
children.summary: Set to true to enable display of internal diagnostic messages.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly MethodDisplay As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v2, v3
children.summary: A flag which indicates how the default test method display name is calculated.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly MethodDisplayOptions As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v2, v3
children.summary: A flag which indicates how the test method display name calculation can be modified by special naming patterns.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly PreEnumerateTheories As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v2, v3
children.summary: Set to true to enable pre-enumeration of theories during discovery.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly PrintMaxEnumerableLength As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v3 1.1.0+
children.summary: Sets the maximum number of items to print in a collection.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly PrintMaxObjectDepth As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v3 1.1.0+
children.summary: Sets the maximum recursive depth when printing object values.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly PrintMaxObjectMemberCount As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v3 1.1.0+
children.summary: Sets the maximum number of members to show when printing object values.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly PrintMaxStringLength As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v3 1.1.0+
children.summary: Sets the maximum length when printing a string value.

content.value: Public Shared ReadOnly SynchronousMessageReporting As String

children.remarks:
Value type:
Consumed by: v2, v3
children.summary: Set to true to enable synchronous message reporting; set to false to enable asynchronous message reporting. Synchronous in this case means the system will wait for the runner to process a message before delivering the next one.
